content: विरंज् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To grow discoloured or soiled, be coarse or rough; केशा अपि विरज्यंते निःस्नेहाः किं न सेवकाः <ls>Pt. 1. 82</ls> (where it has sense 2 also). {@--2@} To be discontented or disaffected, to dislike, hate; चिरानुरक्तोऽपि विरज्यते जनः <ls>Mk. 1. 53</ls>; यां चिंतयामि सततं मयि सा विरक्ता <ls>Bh. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>Bk. 18. 22.</ls> {@--3@} To become disgusted with the world and hence to renounce all worldly attachments. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To colour, dye.
